Package simulation.engine

Interface Summary
BodySetListener This listener is notified when the set of bodies in the simulation changes, whether a body is added or taken away.
PhysicsListener This interface should be implemented by any class that needs to monitor the state of a System.
 

Class Summary
Body This class represents a rigid body.
BodyConnection A connection to a body.
BodySetEvent Represents the change in the set of bodies in a Simulation.
CollisionCircle A circle that has a center and radius.
CollisionPolygon A polygon that can collide with other shapes.
CollisionResult The result of a collision calculation.
CollisionShape A shape that can be tested to see if it collides with another shape.
Maximizer<T> A utility class to find the maximum of a bunch of values.
PhysicsApplet  
PhysicsEvent This represents an event in the System, which models the simulation.
Profiler A profiler that will take performance measurements from a certain thread.
Simulation A system of objects.
Spring A spring that connects to objects.
TranslationMaximizer A type of maximizer that tries to maximize CollisionResults' translations.
TranslationMinimizer A type of maximizer that tries to minimize CollisionResults' translations.
Vector A 2-dimensional vector containing an x and y coordinate.
